testsuite.name: com.coffee.api.CoffeeTest

testcase.name: API returns 201 on POST request with valid data()

testsuite.system-out:
***** REQUEST: POST: /coffees ***** POST /coffees HTTP/1.1
{"coffeeName":"Colombian Single Origin","roastedBy":"Monmouth Coffee Company"} 15:55:33.086 [Test worker] DEBUG Exposed -- SELECT roaster.id, roaster."name", roaster.url, roaster.address FROM roaster WHERE roaster."name" = 'Monmouth Coffee Company' 15:55:33.157 [Test worker] DEBUG Exposed -- INSERT INTO coffee ("name") VALUES ('Colombian Single Origin') 15:55:33.160 [Test worker] DEBUG Exposed -- INSERT INTO roastercoffee (roaster_id, coffee_id) VALUES (1, 8) ***** RESPONSE 201 to POST: /coffees ***** New coffee created! 201 Created
